channel.title: My Verbal Diarrhea
channel.description: Recent content on My Verbal Diarrhea

item.title: On turn based strategy versus RTS
My First Post
item.description: 1. Today I’ve read a bit from “Working Effectively with Legacy Code” by Michael C. Feathers … and a sentence from that boook, that caught my attention the most was: ‘To me, legacy code is simply code without tests.’ 2. I’m still struggiling with horrific traumatic past events (sampling a few, as per to ‘bury adequately some past traumatic events of mine’ as in vs. ‘shoving them under the rug’):
